issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description: The current e2e test driver module(TestDriverCurl.pm) uses the deprecated API for hive 0.12. Use the jobs api introduced in Hive 0.12 for killing a job, getting the status of a job, etc. The reference is https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/WebHCat+Reference
fields.summary: Add webhcat e2e tests using 1. jobs (GET) 2. jobs/:jobid (GET) 3. jobs/:jobid (DELETE) apis

comments.body: Replacing deprecated webhcat APIs with the ones specified in https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/WebHCat+Reference

{color:red}Overall{color}: -1 no tests executed

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12610926/HIVE-5617.1.patch.txt
